name: Half of Who You Are
description:
Jump and climb your way through this puzzling platformer. Split yourself in half to complete every puzzle in this game.

I forgot to say in game, but you use E to switch between which part of the body you're using and you can jump with the upper-body to move faster, but it doesn't jump that high

Please do not play in full-screen it breaks the scene transitions! Also when the door opens and nothing happens, that is the end

All assets, music, code, etc was made by NovaKnight531 (me) in 48 hours for the United Game Jam. (Unity)

The theme for the jam was "Two" so in this game you split yourself into "two" halves of your own body to complete the many puzzles
